input.sentences: [male] was making some sweet treats for his daughter and wife .
he put frosting and then sprinkles on them .
his daughter was in awe of the treats .
many were gone by the time he got to sample them .
output.sentences: John's wife loves to make sweet treats.
She always puts extra sprinkles on the chocolate frosting.
John absolutely loved his wife's baking.
His daughter was in awe over her mother's treats.
The only time she's allowed to sample them is after she has eaten her dinner.
